reviewtext: This is one sweet device! This is the best value for your money in a PDA.  Its far more economical than the Vx or even V for that matter. I personally  like the looks of the IIIxe over that of the V series especially since the  IIIxe is jet black(versus the onlder III models with the gray case). The  case also seems more rugged and sturdy than the Visor series. Buy this!
